data.title: Live Search Release Notes
data.meta_description: The latest release information for Live Search from Adobe Commerce.
data.text:
Last update: Tue Aug 06 2024 00:00:00 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

CREATED FOR:

Admin

These release notes describe the latest versions of Live Search.

Support is provided for the current major released version. Release notes for older versions are provided for reference.

Updates include:

New features

Fixes and improvements

Known issues

These notes describe updates that were published outside of a versioned release or improvements to the hosted service.

August 7, 2024

Increased the maximum interval value, or price range for price faceting from 10,000 to 40,000,000.

February 13, 2024

Live Search now supports setting a default rule for Search Merchandising.

October 12, 2023

Commerce administrators can now specify the language of the index for Live Search. See Settings.

The “Search Rules” tab has been renamed to “Search Merchandising”.

June 13, 2023

Fixed an issue where some characters such as quotes or apostrophes caused ranking issues. Reindexing solves these issues.

April 25, 2023

Live Search customers can now take advantage of the new SaaS price indexer.

PLP widget

May 31, 2024

Released version 2.0.0 of the PLP widget, which adds support for the following features:

Add to Cart buttons - Available only for simple products.

Multiple images per product - Image can change when a different color is chosen for a configurable product.

October 27, 2023

The Live Search PLP widget now supports color swatches.

Live Search 4.2.1 421

July 31, 2024

[Supported]{class="badge informative" title="Supported"} Adobe Commerce versions 2.4.4 and newer

Fixed an issue where certain scripts were not loading on the checkout page.

Fixed a dependency version in the composer.json file.

Live Search 4.2.0 420

May 31, 2024

[Supported]{class="badge informative" title="Supported"} Adobe Commerce versions 2.4.4 and newer

Updated Live Search extension to use PLP widgets version 2.0.0.

Live Search 4.1.2 412

May 16, 2024

[Supported]{class="badge informative" title="Supported"} Adobe Commerce versions 2.4.4 and newer

Fixed the productSearch GraphQL query to correctly filter based on the categoryPath and categoryList for categories.

Live Search 4.1.1 411

Mar 19, 2024

[Supported]{class="badge informative" title="Supported"} Adobe Commerce versions 2.4.4 and newer

New Features

Added language support for Polish.

Live Search now supports PHP 8.3 for installations running Adobe Commerce 2.4.4.

Live Search 4.1.0 410

Feb 22, 2024

[Supported]{class="badge informative" title="Supported"} Adobe Commerce versions 2.4.4 and newer

New Features

The Data Management Dashboard is now available. This revamped dashboard provides insights into data streams for Product Recommendations, Live Search, and Catalog Service.
